live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
31802.summary: Some customers in the Varcity area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31802.title: Jan 12– Calgary (Varcity) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
